name: Anshul Agarwal
position: Product Manager | IIT Kharagpur'22 | Ex-ICICI Bank
about: I'm a product manager with experience both in a startup and an established company. I am  passionate about solving real-world problems. I thrive in interdisciplinary fields and believe that innovation often happens at the intersection of different domains.My academic focus lies in Electronics & Electrical Communication Engineering, and I have also undertaken coursework related to Finance and Entrepreneurship to develop a well-rounded understanding. I'm eager to contribute my skills and knowledge to meaningful projects and collaborate with like-minded individuals. Let's connect and explore opportunities to make a positive impact together.

current_company.name: My Sivi (previously Speakify) (YC W22)
current_company.title: Product Manager | IIT Kharagpur'22 | Ex-ICICI Bank

positions.subtitle: ICICI Bank
positions.description: -Led the end-to-end migration from the legacy system to a React-based architecture, ensuring minimal disruption to ongoing operations .Collaborated closely with cross-functional teams, defining requirements, setting priorities, and facilitating sprints to steadily migrate and enhance the platform.-Oversaw the integration of a product analytics dashboard to provide real-time insights into user behavior and platform performance. Leveraged analytics data to inform product enhancements, enabling data-driven decision-making and ensuring our platform remained competitive and user-centric.
positions.title: Product Manager (Member of Innovation Labs)
positions.description_html:
-Led the end-to-end migration from the legacy system to a React-based architecture, ensuring minimal disruption to ongoing operations .Collaborated closely with cross-functional teams, defining requirements, setting priorities, and facilitating sprints to steadily migrate and enhance the platform.

-Oversaw the integration of a product analytics dashboard to provide real-time insights into user behavior and platform performance. Leveraged analytics data to inform product enhancements, enabling data-driven decision-making and ensuring our platform remained competitive and user-centric.

positions.subtitle: Student Welfare Group, IIT Kharagpur
positions.description: •	Lead a team of 10+ students to organise a 2 day Campus Tour for incoming freshers of 2019 batch as part of their induction program organised under Dean of Students Affairs, IIT Kharagpur•	Organised Programming and Data Structures extra classes for 1st year students in collaboration with Computer Science Engineering Department, also negotiated an increase of over 50% in the budget over 2 consecutive semesters (Autum 2019 and Spring 2020), increased the average monthly attendence per session from 10 to 55 in just under a year, with highest number reaching over 250 students.•	Inititated Panel Discussions on Internships/Placement to help students make informed career choices by inviting accomplished seniors to guide their juniors•	Managed all the finance activities of the SWG Group for the academic session 2019-20
positions.title: Head of Event Planning and Finance
positions.description_html:
• Lead a team of 10+ students to organise a 2 day Campus Tour for incoming freshers of 2019 batch as part of their induction program organised under Dean of Students Affairs, IIT Kharagpur
• Organised Programming and Data Structures extra classes for 1st year students in collaboration with Computer Science Engineering Department, also negotiated an increase of over 50% in the budget over 2 consecutive semesters (Autum 2019 and Spring 2020), increased the average monthly attendence per session from 10 to 55 in just under a year, with highest number reaching over 250 students.
• Inititated Panel Discussions on Internships/Placement to help students make informed career choices by inviting accomplished seniors to guide their juniors
• Managed all the finance activities of the SWG Group for the academic session 2019-20
